suggestions.desc: Use destructuring to get finer-grained redraws
suggestions.output:
<!-- prettier-ignore -->
<script>
    $: ({ info } = foo)
    $: bar = foo.something
    $: baz = foo.bar.baz
</script>

suggestions.desc: Use destructuring to get finer-grained redraws
suggestions.output:
<!-- prettier-ignore -->
<script>
    $: info = foo.info
    $: ({ something: bar } = foo)
    $: baz = foo.bar.baz
</script>
